metadata.title: CVE-2024-23672 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Denial of Service via incomplete cleanup vulnerability in Apache Tomcat. Itwas possible for WebSocket clients to keep WebSocket connections openleading to increased resource consumption.This issue affects Apache Tomcat:from 11.0.0-M1 through 11.0.0-M16, from 10.1.0-M1 through 10.1.18, from9.0.0-M1 through 9.0.85, from 8.5.0 through 8.5.98.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 11.0.0-M17, 10.1.19, 9.0.86 or8.5.99 which fix the issue.

criterions.comment: tomcat6 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat7 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
